Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI could be accessed in real time whilst writing the assessment whereas the teacher feedback could only be gained after submitting the assessment

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher is more personal, whereas the AI is more impersonal / clinical
